description:
Join us for an enlightening evening as we dive into the key takeaways from GitHub Universe 2023! Whether you missed the event or simply want a refresher, our guest speaker will provide an exhaustive summary of all major announcements, features, and developments. Get a comprehensive look at where the platform is headed, mingle with fellow developers, and share thoughts on how these updates can shape the future of software development. Let's come together in late November and decode the Universe! Refreshments provided.

We're hosted by the wonderful folks at Parmenion in central Bristol, look forward to seeing a great showing - with refreshments, and a fantastic community - look forward to seeing lots of you there 🙂
title: April Edwards - Github Universe 2023 in a nutshell
